å°†æ­¤ä¿¡å·è¿æ¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„ ``callable``\ ã€‚è¿˜å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ  ``flags`` å¯¹è¿æ¥çš„è¡Œä¸ºè¿›è¡Œé…ç½®ï¼ˆè§ :ref:`ConnectFlags<enum_Object_ConnectFlags>` å¸¸é‡ï¼‰ã€‚å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`Callable.bind<class_Callable_method_bind>` ä¸ºè¿æ¥çš„ ``callable`` æä¾›é¢å¤–çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚

ä¸€ä¸ªä¿¡å·åªèƒ½å’ŒåŒä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`Callable<class_Callable>` è¿æ¥ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥ä¿¡å·å·²è¿æ¥ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šè¿”å› :ref:`@GlobalScope.ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER<class_@GlobalScope_constant_ERR_INVALID_PARAMETER>` å¹¶æ¨å…¥é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œé™¤éä¿¡å·æ˜¯ç”¨ :ref:`Object.CONNECT_REFERENCE_COUNTED<class_Object_constant_CONNECT_REFERENCE_COUNTED>` è¿æ¥çš„ã€‚è¦é˜²æ­¢è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`is_connected<class_Signal_method_is_connected>` æ£€æŸ¥å·²æœ‰è¿æ¥ã€‚

::

    for button in $Buttons.get_children():
        button.pressed.connect(_on_pressed.bind(button))
    
    func _on_pressed(button):
        print(button.name, " è¢«æŒ‰ä¸‹äº†")
